name: Lock Apala
description:
Your job is to harvest good and bad Karma from the deseased souls and fuel the heavens fountains.

Move with A/D, Q/D, or left and right arrows, as you want.
Jump with Z or up arrow. Looong jump by holding the key.

Bounce on the souls' head to gather the Karma.
Held Karma is indicated in colored counter in the screen's corners.

While jumping, don't miss the souls or you may fall to a certain doom. You'll also need to bounce on one if you want to reach the other side.

Touch a fountain to depose the corresponding type of Karma and score a equivalent amount of points.

Harvested good Karma will deplete the same amount of any bad karma you might hold, and vice versa. Try to collect only one Karma type at the same time!

You'll score a little bonus if you combo-jump more than 3 souls without your feet touching the ground.

As your score goes up, the game will become harder and harder.
Good luck! You'll get it =)

------------------------------------

This game was made under 72h for the ScoreSpace gamejam, a two-sided competition where the best created games are then played by streamers trying to reach the top score. Learn more at www.scorespace.net

All the graphics, sounds, music, design, and coding are 100% made by me during the timeframe! #oneManArmy <3

This game was made with Clickteam Fusion 2.5, music with BoscaCeoil, and sounds with Bfxr and Audacity.

Thanks you for playing!
